sense.name: surrender, give for a specific purpose
sense.examples: He has sacrificed his job and his family's comfort in the struggle to uphold truth. He sacrificed a bishop, two rooks and his queen to deliver checkmate. I will never think of sacrificing her happiness to ambition.

sense.name: sell at a loss
sense.examples: Storekeepers sacrificed their merchandise at half-price to unburden themselves. He sacrificed his stock and paid off his debt.
